46830.summary: Some customers in the Pemberton Heights area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46830.title: Feb 14  – North Vancouver (Pemberton Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
